DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness Ultherapy treatment facial acne .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study : Ulthera® System Treatment Moderate Severe Facial Acne
DOC.detailed_description: Study subject assign one two treatment group . Both treatment group receive treatment center forehead/temples , medial cheek , chin region use 1.5mm 1.0mm transducer . - For Group A , 1.5mm 1.0mm transducer use 0.25J energy set 0.20J energy setting , respectively . - For Group B , 1.5mm 1.0mm transducer use 0.18J energy set 0.15J energy setting , respectively . Subjects receive 3 Ultherapy treatment administer 2 week apart . Subjects required return follow-up assessment 14 , 30 , 60 , 90 180 day follow third Ultherapy treatment . Pre- post-treatment photo take . In addition , pre- post-treatment lesion count sebum measurement obtain .
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 18 year old . Subject good health . Presence clinicallyevident facial acne moderate severe severity least 20 inflammatory lesion 20100 noninflammatory lesion . Presence > 2 nodular lesion area treat . Presence cysts area treat . Presence active systemic local skin disease may affect wound healing . Use alcoholbased topical solution `` exfoliate '' agent within 1 week prior study participation . History frequent herpes simplex infection face clinical evidence active herpes simplex infection . History keloid scar formation . Significant scar area treat . Significant open facial wound lesion . Presence metal stent implant facial area treat .
